docket_entries.description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of Restitution Hearing held on 10/28/2016 before Judge Marsha J. Pechman.Parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no such Notice is filed, the transcript may be made remotely electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days.Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Court Reporter/Transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER. Information regarding the policy can be found on the court's website at www.wawd.uscourts.gov.To purchase a copy of the transcript, contact court reporter Catherine Vernon, 253-627-2062. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 3/6/2017, (SG) (Entered: 12/07/2016)
NOTICE OF WITHDRAWAL OF COUNSEL: Attorney Michael Dion for Plaintiff USA. (Dion, Michael) (Entered: 04/03/2017)

MANDATE of USCA (16-30192, 16-30258) as to David Stephens re 105 Notice of Appeal, 88 Notice of Appeal. Appellants motion for voluntary dismissal of consolidated appeal Nos. 16-30192 and 16-30258 (Docket Entry No. 21) is granted. Consolidated appeal Nos. 16-30192 and 16-30258 are dismissed. See Fed. R. App. P. 42(b); 9th Cir. R. 27-9.1. This order served on the district court shall act as and for the mandate of this court for consolidated appeal Nos. 16-30192 and 16-30258. (CDA) (Entered: 04/18/2017)

MOTION for Forfeiture of Property (Final Order of Forfeiture) by USA as to David Stephens (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit 1 - AUSA Thomas Declaration Supporting Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture, # 2 Proposed Order for Final Order of Forfeiture) Noting Date 5/5/2017, (Thomas, Matthew) (Entered: 04/26/2017)
MOTION of Appellate Counsel to Withdraw Following Appeal by David Stephens. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order) Noting Date 5/12/2017, (Zink, Marla) (Entered: 04/30/2017)
FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE as to David Stephens 122 MOTION for Forfeiture of Property (Final Order of Forfeiture) by Judge Marsha J. Pechman. cc: USMO (AF); (RM) (Entered: 05/05/2017)
ORDER Granting 123 Appellate Counsel's Motion to Withdraw Following Appeal as to David Stephens by Judge Marsha J. Pechman.(RM) (Entered: 05/12/2017)
